title: Unrecognized configuration key "quarkus.launch.rebuild" reported when re-augmenting the application
body:
### Describe the bug

Unrecognized configuration key "quarkus.launch.rebuild" reported when re-augmenting the application

```
java -Dquarkus.launch.rebuild=true -jar target/quarkus-app/quarkus-run.jar
2023-07-18 15:10:16,106 WARN  [io.qua.config] (build-2) Unrecognized configuration key "quarkus.launch.rebuild" was provided; it will be ignored; verify that the dependency extension for this configuration is set or that you did not make a typo
2023-07-18 15:10:16,489 INFO  [io.qua.dep.QuarkusAugmentor] (main) Quarkus augmentation completed in 1441ms
```

Warning about `quarkus.launch.rebuild` should not be shown.



### Expected behavior

Warning about `quarkus.launch.rebuild` should not be shown.

### Actual behavior

```
2023-07-18 15:10:16,106 WARN  [io.qua.config] (build-2) Unrecognized configuration key "quarkus.launch.rebuild" was provided; it will be ignored; verify that the dependency extension for this configuration is set or that you did not make a typo
```

### How to Reproduce?

 - Download app from code.quarkus
 - Run `mvn clean install -Dquarkus.package.type=mutable-jar`
 - Run `java -Dquarkus.launch.rebuild=true -jar target/quarkus-app/quarkus-run.jar`

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

macOS

### Output of `java -version`

17

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.2.0.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
